cui_name: Stage IV Colon Cancer AJCC v8
reasoning: Stage IV colon cancer (AJCC v8 classification) represents approximately 18-20% of incident colon cancers (~40 per 100k total), estimated at ~7.2 per 100k. Similar to C2217040 but specific to colon (excludes rectum). Based on GLOBOCAN 2005 colon cancer data with AJCC stage distribution.
